Deprecated API

Contents

  • Terminally Deprecated
  • Methods
  • Terminally Deprecated Elements
    Element
    Description
    me.manossef.semihardcore.SemiHardcore.getDeadPlayersFile()
    The deadPlayers.yml file has been removed.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    me.manossef.semihardcore.data.Options.canPlayersBeGenerous()
    Use Options.playersCanBeGenerous(). This method is kept for backwards compatibility.
    me.manossef.semihardcore.data.Options.canPlayersGiveAwayLastLife()
    Use Options.playersCanGiveAwayLastLife(). This method is kept for backwards compatibility.
    me.manossef.semihardcore.data.Options.canPlayersSacrificeToReviveSomeoneDead()
    Use Options.sacrificesForRevival(). This method is kept for backwards compatibility.
    me.manossef.semihardcore.data.Options.doesLightningStrikeOnLastDeath()
    Use Options.lightningStrikeOnLastDeath(). This method is kept for backwards compatibility.
    me.manossef.semihardcore.data.Options.forcesHardDifficulty()
    Use Options.forceHardDifficulty(). This method is kept for backwards compatibility.
    me.manossef.semihardcore.data.Options.getLivesLimit()
    Use Options.livesLimit(). This method is kept for backwards compatibility.
    me.manossef.semihardcore.data.Options.getMaximumStartingLives()
    Use Options.startingLivesMax(). This method is kept for backwards compatibility.
    me.manossef.semihardcore.data.Options.getMinimumStartingLives()
    Use Options.startingLivesMin(). This method is kept for backwards compatibility.
    me.manossef.semihardcore.data.Options.hasHardcoreHearts()
    Use Options.hardcoreHearts(). This method is kept for backwards compatibility.
    me.manossef.semihardcore.LifeChanges.addLifeUpToLimit(Player)
    It is no longer possible to breach the life limit using LifeChanges.addLife(Player), therefore this method has no use.
    me.manossef.semihardcore.LifeChanges.respectLivesLimit(Player)
    It is no longer possible for a player to ever have a life count above the limit, therefore this method has no use.
    me.manossef.semihardcore.LifeChanges.setDead(Player, boolean)
    The dead players list has been removed, therefore there wouldn't be a point in using this method anymore. Using LifeChanges.setLives(org.bukkit.entity.Player, int) with a life count of 0 is enough.
    me.manossef.semihardcore.LifeChanges.setLivesUpToLimit(Player, int)
    It is no longer possible to breach the life limit using LifeChanges.setLives(Player, int), therefore this method has no use.
    me.manossef.semihardcore.SemiHardcore.getDeadPlayersFile()
    The deadPlayers.yml file has been removed.
